Record a Session for Load Test

record_session.Rd

Record a Session for Load Test

record_session(target_app_url, host = "0.0.0.0", port = 8600,
  output_file = "recording.log", open_browser = TRUE)

Arguments

target_app_url

The URL of the deployed application
host

The host where the proxy will run. Usually localhost is used.
port

The port for the proxy. Default is 8600. Change this default if port 8600 is used by another service.
output_file

The name for the generated log file.
open_browser

Whether to open a browser on the proxy (default=TRUE) or not (FALSE).

Value

Cerates a recording file that can be used to drive a load test.

Details

This function creates a reverse proxy listening at host:port that stands in front of target_app_url. As the user interacts with the app, the actions and responses are recorded in a file that can be replayed later.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
